ygData.subject: RE: Harvester Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to turn the note back in with the other 3 items.  If you look at the note it says something like reminder: shadowed scythe... Since the shadowed items
ygData.messageBody:
You need to turn the note back in with the other 3 items. If you look at
the note it says something like reminder: shadowed scythe... Since the
shadowed items disappear when you log out this allows you to get the scythe
at any time instead of it having to be the last thing you get (Like for the
robe, gloves, and boots). So you need all four items. If you have the
other 3 then get the scythe just give him the scythe by itself first to get
the note, then right away give him the note and the other 3 items.

Azerin D'Tsalaroth

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... [mailto:Aazen1@...]
Sent: Monday, November 22, 1999 11:25 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Harvester Quest

From: Aazen1@...

I know that to get the note for the next 3 items needed for the Harvester
quest you need to turn in a shadow man's scythe (sp). But if you know the 3
items needed is it possible to bypass this first part?

Thanks in advance!
Aazen SyVex
